subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Whereas the Giants welcomed slugger Barry Bonds back for a ceremony earlier this season, the Yanks excluded Roger Clemens at the Yankee Stadium farewell in an effort to re-write history.
snippet: Whereas the Giants welcomed slugger Barry Bonds back for a ceremony earlier this season, the Yanks excluded Roger Clemens at the Yankee Stadium farewell in an effort to re-write history.
